body: Usually, people will change clothes according to seasonal temperature change. So, shall we estimate the typical indoor clothing level based on outdoor air temperature and use it as input for the **PMV thermal comfort** evaluation component as shown below? Please advise if the **temperature ranges** and the **corresponding typical indoor clothing levels** need to be adjusted based on your experiences in thermal comfort studies.
